00209 
00210 
00212 #define SCBM_ASYNC_GET_RESULT(async) \
00213     { (async)->forget = 0; }
00214 
00216 #define SCBM_ASYNC_FORGET(async) \
00217     { (async)->forget = 1; \
00218       (async)->callback_routine = NULL; }
00219 
00222 #define SCBM_ASYNC_CALLBACK(async, routine, context) \
00223     { (async)->forget = 1; \
00224       (async)->callback_routine = routine; \
00225       (async)->callback_context = context; }
